cast.name: 纳伊玛·维夫斯特兰德 Naima Wifstrand
马克斯·冯·叙多夫 Max von Sydow
云韦·诺德瓦尔 Yngve Nordwall

writer.name: 亚尔马·伯格曼 Hjalmar Bergman

director.name: 英格玛·伯格曼 Ingmar Bergman

introduction: Mr. Sleeman Is Coming (Swedish: Herr Sleeman kommer) is a 1917 one-act play by the Swedish author Hjalmar Bergman; the main character is an orphaned young woman who is about to be married off to an unappealing but rich old man, Mr.Sleeman, at the instigation of her aunts who have taken charge of her. Bergman infuses the situation with overtones of rueful pessimism concerning life in general.The play is one of his most successful pieces of theatre and has been staged ,many times in Sweden and also on Swedish television. In 1957, Ingmar Bergman directed the first tv adaptation.The director and the writer were not relatives; Bergman is a common family name in Sweden.from wikipedia
